Personal Labor With Apprentice Watchmaker at Nimes. When laboring in Nimes, France, we made it our work to save souls. There was a young man who had become discouraged through the temptations of Satan and through some mistakes of our brethren who did not understand how to deal with the minds of the youth. He gave up the Sabbath and engaged to work in a manufacturing 


                                    -65- 

establishment to perfect his trade in watchmaking. He is a very promising young man. My watch needed repairing, which brought us together.
